website_summaries.verdict: High-quality neoprene, ease of care, and different color choices make this carrier a great companion for your outings and parties.
pros: Made from stretchy, non-toxic, insulating neoprene
Well-made and versatile for holding anything from beer to bottled water to baby bottles
Easy care, machine washable or simply wipe clean
A great gift idea, available in several different, attractive colors
Makes a good, reasonably priced gift
cons: According to some purchasers, the openings are not all the same size, and some types of containers are a tight squeeze

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how cold it would keep 6 bottles of beer but it would be great for carrying bottled water
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a "guy" at our annual block Christmas party. I filled it with bottles of beer. It was a hit. It was made well. Not sure how cold it would keep 6 bottles of beer but it would be great for carrying bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: Otis2424

customer_reviews.title: Good to carry around my homebrews
customer_reviews.text: Carries 6 normal beer bottles no problem. Won't keep drinks cold long term but does work well for transporting. Both sides of the carrier are attached in the center unlike some on here.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I used it for water bottles and it worked for ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it for water bottles and it worked for my daughter and I during summer break. The only thing that bothered me was the smell that never went away. Every time I drank out of the bottle I would smell it
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I love the color of my blue striped one I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I would buy another one of these if they ever get back in stock! I love the color of my blue striped one I purchased, and it makes a great gift - - just fill it with bottles (beer, wine coolers, etc.), and you are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: JKSKS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for glass beer bottles, not glass baby bottles...
customer_reviews.text: The product works as expected for beer bottles, but if you have glass baby bottles with the silicone sleeve, this product won't work for you. The silicone sleeves jam up and you can't slide the bottles in. This will work for plastic bottles, though, and probably work great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barnette

customer_reviews.title: It arrived quickly and is of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: gave as a gift, and my friend really likes it. It arrived quickly and is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Products!!!
customer_reviews.text: It makes hauling beverages so much easier and if they are bottles, they don't break!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mickala Smith

customer_reviews.title: Prevents baby bottle leakage
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We use it to transport our baby bottles to daycare and they do not spill anymore!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Highly recommend these to carry your favorite beverage in while hiking / camping.
customer_reviews.author: Boba Fett

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not all of the openings are the same. Not worth shipping back but would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for tail gaiting can grab a six pack and walk around.
customer_reviews.author: BAM in SoDak

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits thinner bottles better than larger bottles but all sizes will fit if you really jam them in there. Keeps drinks colder longer. I bring it to my kids softball games so we have a nice non-bulky "cooler" to have our waters in.
customer_reviews.author: ktbt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat idea .....
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to carry, keeps our sodas and water bottles cold. The soft construction is good for car trips because we can pack the tote anywhere and it's within easy reach while driving. Looks sleek and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Onstott

customer_reviews.title: This product is great for keeping a 6 pack of beers cold for ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for keeping a 6 pack of beers cold for a few hours. The neoprene material is soft and flexible. It's super easy to pack away and store.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Klein

customer_reviews.title: I take it to the gym and have been very pleased with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: I was asked to test this product and write a review. I placed 6 cold beverages into my new tote and was honestly surprised at how long it did stay cold. I take it to the gym and have been very pleased with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: London Tailor Neoprene Bottle Tote Carrier Cooler - Holds a Six (6) Pack of Beer or Soda Bottles or Cans - Protects Glass from Damage - Insulated Like Coolers - Easy to Carry - Jungle Leaf Design
product_meta.description: Color:Jungle LeafA SIX PACK WITH STYLE.... HOOPLA STYLE! This stylish lightweight neoprene six bottle carrier is an absolute must for all homes. It allows the contents to be safely and snuggly carried without the clinking noises! It's great whether you're off to: DAY CARE THE GAME POP OR JUICE FOR A PICNIC A SUMMER TIME BBQ OR COOKOUT THE BEACH THE GYM A BRING YOUR OWN (BYOB) RESTAURANT A PARTY / CELEBRATION CAMPING or HUNTING TAILGATING PARTIES for football, baseball, basketball, ice hockey or Nascar It's perfect for: FORMULA OR BREASTMILK for daycare SIPPY CUPS for a day out and about SIX PACK BEER BOTTLES for tailgating and byob SPORTS DRINKS /WATER BOTTLES for your SODA CANS OR CONDIMENT BOTTLES AND A PRACTICAL BABY SHOWER GIFT This is the perfect solution to carrying up to six bottles around with you safely and discretely. This stylish neoprene LIGHT-WEIGHT tote is the answer. Made from stretchy non toxic neoprene material (similar to wetsuits), carry your bottles in SAFETY and STYLE. Re-use this tote time and time again, MACHINE WASHABLE or just wipe clean and your ready to go again. FOLDS FLAT when not in use for EASY STORAGE. The HOOPLA carrier is able to keep the temperature of your drinks lower for longer (dependent on outside temperature), so perfect for any social occasion. Please note this listing is for a 6 bottle bag only. Be sure to check out the rest of the HOOPLA range - also available as a lunch bag and 2 wine /water bottle carriers. NEW COLOURS JUST IN USA STAR SPANGLED BANNER, BABY PINK & BABY BLUE! BUILT BY LONDON TAILOR - ORDER NOW by clicking the Add to Cart button at the top of the page.
feature_bullets: GREAT GIFT IDEA: The perfect man bag for beer! A great gift for that hard to buy for beer loving man in your life. Birthdays and special occasions, don't just give a few bottles as a gift, give it in a HOOPLA Gorilla Bag! It's also a perfectly practical baby shower gift for a new mom or dad. NEW COLOURS AVAILABLE - All American Star Spangled Banner, Baby Pink and Baby Blue. Click Catch a Gecko above to see the full range.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
